AGE POLICY: Features & Amenities Topgolf 2 floors 70+ all-weather bays Toptracer games 28-foot video wall and 200+ HDTVs Free Wi-Fi Rooftop terrace with fire pits Private event spaces Bar & restaurant 9-hole mini golf course Golf Lessons View Virtual Tour About Topgolf Charleston Welcome to Topgolf Charleston, the premier entertainment destination in North Charleston, SC. Enjoy year-round comfort in our hitting bays with cooling fans in the summer and heated bays in the winter, all with HDTVs in every bay and throughout our . Using our complimentary clubs or your own, take aim at the giant outfield targets and our high-tech balls will score themselves. sports bar and restaurant Read More Change Day to Sunday Pricing Per Bay at Topgolf Charleston What is a bay? Prices are per hour, per hitting bay. Each bay can fit up to 6 players, so bring your friends and split the cost 6 ways! Prices do not include sales tax. $6 one-time member fee required for new players. Find your way to play Plan a Visit How to Play Promotions & News at Topgolf Charleston Winter Play Days Play anytime Monday - Thursday and enjoy a locked-in low hourly price per bay! Sunday Funday Skip the chores and come by for some high-scoring fun $40/hr all day every Sunday. Topgolf Nights When we drop prizes, beats and the price, a night out at Topgolf might cost less than ordering takeout! View All Promos Make Your Event More Eventful Rain or shine, day or night, make your next party or group event more eventful at Topgolf Charleston. We offer versatile event catering packages perfect for your next birthday party, company event or social get-together! Parties & Events Chat

Skip to Content Topgolf Menu Fuel Your Play. We put a lot of work into the food and drinks you enjoy between swings at Topgolf. Our chefs spend their days and nights dishing out everything from delicious classics to unique treats you can only find here, so be sure to come hungry. Virginia Beach WA - Seattle - Renton Go Explore Some of Topgolf’s Best Food Our menu has pages of delicious food and drinks, and some of our favorites are below. From vegetarian and gluten-free options to donut holes, our menu caters to almost every taste. Treat yourself to something new or get a shareable for your whole crew. Then, top it off with one of our specialty drinks and keep on playing. Limited Time Fan Zone Faves Learn More Fried Chicken Heat-wich Winter Flavorland Learn More Topgolf Donut Holes-In-One Menu selections are subject to availability and may vary by venue. Frequently Asked Questions Do you have any vegetarian options? Yes, several items on our menu are vegetarian or can be modified to be vegetarian: Cheesy Macaroni Bites without sauce Warm Pretzel Bites Queso Blanco & Chips Fiesta Nachos Mediterranean Trio Cheese Flatbread Farmhouse Flatbread French Fries Tater Tots Topgolf Donut Hole-In-Ones Cookie Crumble Sundae Kids Grilled Cheese Sub a Black Bean Patty on any of our burgers. Modifications: Do you have any gluten-friendly options? Items that are or can be modified to be gluten-friendly: Queso Blanco & Chips Buffalo Chicken Dip without Cheddar Jack Topping Any flatbread with Sub a Gluten-Friendly Crust Tres Tacos (Mushroom, Chicken, Shrimp, Steak) All-American and Smokehouse Burgers with Gluten-Friendly Bun Grilled Chicken Sandwich with Gluten-Friendly Bun Cobb Salad Cheese Fries French Fries Tater Tots Do you have any vegan options? Yes, we have items on our menu that are vegan or can be modified to be vegan. Can I bring in my own food? We do not permit outside food or beverage to be brought in due to health and safety practices. The only exception is for store bought cakes for birthdays or other celebrations. PLEASE NOTE: Products containing allergens and gluten are stored in this kitchen. Please be aware that there may be a chance of cross-contact so we cannot guarantee these products for those with a food allergy or celiac disease. Guests are advised to consider this information as it relates to their individual dietary needs and requirements. Before placing your order, please inform your server if a person in your party has a food allergy.Topgolf is committed to continuing toward our goal of sourcing 100% cage-free, whole-shell eggs for all locations by the end of 2026. Make Your Event More Eventful Rain or shine, day or night, make your next party or group event more eventful at Topgolf undefined. We offer versatile event catering packages perfect for your next birthday party, company event, fundraiser or social get-together! Parties & Events Chat

Skip to Content Current Promotions at Topgolf Charleston What’s Happening Change Location Winter Play Days Play anytime Monday - Thursday and enjoy a locked-in low hourly price per bay! Sunday Funday Skip the chores and come by for some high-scoring fun $40/hr all day every Sunday. Topgolf Nights When we drop prizes, beats and the price, a night out at Topgolf might cost less than ordering takeout! Free Pepsi Drinks in January Members get FREE unlimited Pepsi drinks for their bay every visit all month! That's on top of the free appetizer every visit AND a monthly hour of free game play. Weekday Mornings $15 Unlimited Play Weekday Mornings Start your day off right with unlimited Topgolf game play when you choose to pay per person, instead of by bay. Winter Leagues Come join the fun at Winter Leagues! Register your team or sign up as an individual before January 26. Lesson and Game Play Packages Combine practice and play with a Topgolf Coach lesson package. Includes two one-hour lessons and two free hours of game play for one incredible price! Heroes Program We are proud to offer military (active duty and veterans), police, fire and EMS personnel, healthcare workers, and teachers 10% off Topgolf game play plus additional benefits. Premium Golf Club Upgrade On your next visit to Topgolf, ask about upgrading to the latest Callaway golf clubs! Refer a Friend Invite friends to download the Topgolf App and become a Member - and you both get $15. See terms for full details. Limited Time Only Winter Flavorland From warm drinks to shareable appetizers, there's a ton of tasty new menu items to try while you play, but only for a limited time. Swing our New Golf Club The Sure Thing club has everything you’d ever need to make hitting the ball easier. Exclusively at Topgolf. Play the Sonic the Hedgehog Game Everyone's favorite hedgehog is at a Topgolf near you! All ages and skill levels are welcome in this new Sonic the Hedgehog game. Experience Football Our Way Gear up and game on, here, game day goes way beyond your screen. REP your team, FEAST on fan-favorite eats and take a few swings — we’re bringing PLAY to game days in a big way. Limited Time Only Fan-Zone Faves Make your picks and build your game day lineup this fall with our delicious food and drink options! Cash App Card Cardholder Benefits at Topgolf Cash App has partnered with Visa and Topgolf to offer exclusive benefits to Cash App Card cardholders from the moment you book to the moment you pay! Chat

Skip to Content Parties Topgolf undefined & Events We can host it all, and it’ll be way cooler than boring restaurants or conference rooms that are always too cold. From throwing parties for friends and family to hosting corporate events with your team, Topgolf is the perfect place to get everyone together. What can we plan with you? Virginia Beach WA - Seattle - Renton Go There’s Nowhere Like Topgolf It all starts with our Events Team, willing to work through every single detail to make your event epic. We host so we’ve seen it all. We can help steer you in the right direction, pick food and drink menus sure to please and ensure everything goes off without a hitch. thousands of big and small parties & events every year, At Topgolf, you also get the fun of outside, without worrying about the elements throwing off your plans. From the middle of summer to the dead of winter, our will keep everyone comfortable as they play our fun-for-all games. fans, heaters and covered bays Difference The Topgolf Food and drinks as tasty as your favorite restaurant, plus spaces as productive as the best conference centers, and we haven’t even talked about the golf yet. Fun for all Skill Levels Trust us, we know golf can be hard, but it’s always a good time! We take the classic game to new levels with one-of-a-kind games like and , plus a custom golf club called made to help get the ball in the air, regardless of your skill level. Block Party Angry Birds The Sure Thing Chef-Crafted Menu Our mouthwatering catering packages are perfect for any event. We can satisfy diets of all kinds, with a variety of fresh tasty eats and refreshing drinks to fuel your play or keep hunger at bay during your next meeting. View Nutritional Information Flexible All-Weather Venue We’ve got you covered, no matter what Mother Nature has up her sleeve. Our bays are covered, with fans to keep you cool and heaters to keep you toasty. Plus we can accommodate groups of just a few all the way up to thousands of guests. Unique Event Upgrades Plus up your event with exclusive extras like to track who’s on top, a Topgolf Coach to offer tips on the fly to your guests, or unique Topgolf apparel and gifts you can send everyone home with. We even have custom invitations you can share. Talk to the Events Team for details! Live Leaderboards Evite Frequently Asked Questions Will my bays be side-by-side? Yes, if you book 2 bays with game play + food and beverage online or through our sales team, you will be in the best available side-by-side bays. Do I have to be good at golf to have fun? Heck no! Topgolf is a game that anyone can play and enjoy, even if you’re getting more hole-in-nones than hole-in-ones. Our games are fun for every skill level, or swing for a little extra help. The Sure Thing Can I bring my own clubs? If you’re more comfortable playing with your own clubs, we have designated areas within our bays to store them. We will also store your clubs in our club room if your event hasn’t started yet so that you can enjoy our venue without lugging them around. Can I bring a cake? If that will make your experience sweeter, then heck yeah! We require that all cakes be store-bought with clearly-labeled ingredients in case of allergies because we care about the safety and well-being of all our Guests. Please note we cannot store your cake - the only exception is ice cream cake which we can store temporarily in our freezer as long as it is in a covered/sealed container. Can I use a gift card to pay for my event? Unfortunately, gift cards cannot be used towards payments for events. Is Topgolf wheelchair and ADA accessible? Yes! You can also ask your Bayhost to get you an ADA hitting mat and tee. Elevators are available in multi-level venues, and our hitting bays are large enough to allow you to play in a wheelchair comfortably. More questions? or just . Check out our full FAQs contact a Topgolf event planner Chat
